aws_redshift_snapshot_copy_grant.description: Creates a snapshot copy grant that allows AWS Redshift to encrypt copied snapshots with a customer master key from AWS KMS in a destination region.

snapshot_copy_grant_name.description: A friendly name for identifying the grant.

kms_key_id.description: The unique identifier for the customer master key (CMK

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of snapshot copy grant
